story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a seasoned sales professional with over 13 years of experience in the world of outside sales, operations, and marketing. A natural leader with a flair for Spanish and English communication, this professional's journey is a testament to their growth in the sales industry.

The story begins in 2000 when they took the bold step of becoming a business owner. For seven years, they managed their own company, masterfully juggling residential and commercial sales while supervising installations. During this time, they became well-versed in everything from ceramic tiles to hardwood flooring, regularly attending trade shows like Surfaces and Mohawk U to stay ahead of industry trends.

After their entrepreneurial venture, they joined a company in 2008 where they continued to excel in flooring sales, adding project estimation and installation supervision to their growing skill set. Their ability to build lasting client relationships and meet tight deadlines became their trademark.

The next chapter of their career saw them take on the role of Territory Manager, where they truly shined. Managing a portfolio of 30 accounts and generating $60,000-$90,000 in monthly sales, they exceeded team goals by an impressive 30%. They established new territories and created valuable sales contacts through face-to-face meetings with business executives.

Their most recent role as Sales Representative from 2012 to 2014 showcased their ability to expand business horizons. They successfully added 10 new accounts in the Rio Grande Valley territory, demonstrating their keen understanding of customer needs and product specifications.

Throughout their career, this professional has maintained an enthusiastic yet professional demeanor, combining their natural leadership abilities with strong organizational skills. Their educational foundation from James Pace High School, supplemented by continuing education in Interior Decoration, has helped them understand both the technical and aesthetic aspects of their industry.

What sets them apart is their comprehensive skill set: from negotiating contracts and managing territories to supervising teams and maintaining meticulous attention to detail. They're not just a sales representative; they're a relationship builder, a problem solver, and a strategic thinker who consistently drives results while maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction.
